Abilene.Hardin\u2013Simmons University:
Hardin–Simmons University (HSU) is a private Baptist university located in Abilene, Texas, United States.


== History ==
Hardin–Simmons University was founded as Abilene Baptist College in 1891 by the Sweetwater Baptist Association and a group of cattlemen and pastors who sought to bring Christian higher education to the Southwest. The purpose of the school would be "to lead students to Christ, teach them of Christ, and train them for Christ." The original land was donated to the university by rancher C.W. Merchant.
